A prospective cohort study in the United Kingdom demonstrated that GWG above the revised Institute of 
Medicine (IoM) of the US National Academy of Sciences recommendations [97] is associated with increased 
adiposity and CVD risk factors in offspring [76]. Fraser et al. suggest that the timing of GWG is important, 
so that GWG from week 0 to week 14 was associated with an incremental increase in offspring adiposity, 
whereas GWG between week 14 and we
